verbs.description: As [ARG0: Special Counsel Robert Mueller ’s probe] [V: hits] [ARG1: the one - year mark] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] , Republicans in midterm elections have started to see an opportunity to use the Trump controversy to their advantage – by appealing to voters tired of the never - ending investigation .
